term.title: resonance fluorescence technique

item.text: The monitoring of atoms or radicals generated in the gas phase by observing the intensity of fluorescence (exitance) emitted by the species after excitation with radiation of the same wavelength.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2271 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)
